Job Description: Are you a new business focused sales professional looking for a new challenge? Do you have intimate knowledge of the On- or Offshore Energy markets? Do you enjoy understanding technology and pride yourself in being able to follow technical discussions? If so, read on as IHC IQIP, the market leader in the foundation, installation and handling equipment is looking to expand its sales team, based in Sliedrecht!As an experienced Sales Manager you will be responsible for sales as well as rental of hydraulic piling hammers and handling tools, operating in one automated an integrated package. Your key markets are not only Offshore Wind, but also Oil & Gas, and Decommissioning and Coastal & Civil. Turning market intelligence and demand into a proactive market approach for the European Market you will contribute greatly to increasing our client base. Besides expanding our portfolio you will foster valuable relationships with already existing customers. You'll join a sales team of 7 and be an integral part to our commercial operations.In this role you will:Generate new business, from prospecting to drafting and closing contractsBroaden and build on already existing customer relationshipsHandle all administration around lead generation, contracts and visit reportsParticipate in international trade shows, organize roadshows and customer presentationsCollect and translate market intelligence into actionable sales plansThe be considered for this role, you have:A completed diploma from a higher educational institution, preferably either mechanical engineering or business administrationExtensive experience in handling long sales cycles of capital goods. Strong preference is for a candidate who has detailed knowledge of the Offshore Wind marketAffinity with legal language, having experience drawing up and finalizing contractsExcellent command of English, both written and verbal. If you speak any other European language, it is a plus.Willingness to travel, as in the future (and circumstances allowing) you are expected to spend considerable time at customer/event locations
